script:
function alfred_args {
  /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript -e 'function run(argv) { return JSON.stringify({ alfredworkflow: { arg: argv } }) }' "${@}"
}

urls=()

for url in "${@}"; do
  urls+=("$(/usr/bin/curl curl --silent "https://is.gd/create.php?format=simple&url=${url}")")
done

alfred_args "${urls[@]}"
taskDescription: Uses is.gd to shorten a URL
